question.title: How implement loader view like DotsLoader, Spinkit etc. on Android Studio?
question.body:
In my project I want try to add a loader view, specially DotsLoader. I added its dependency

implementation ("com.agrawalsuneet.androidlibs:dotsloader:1.4")

but it's not working, I don't know why. I searched on Google and found a lot more dependencies, but those were also not working.

After that. I tried Spinkit loader with the dependency: implementation ("com.github.ybq:Android-SpinKit:1.4.0")

but it also does not work.

I don't know what happened. I use androidx with SDK 34.

If anyone knows a solution for my problem, please reply.
